mapper.select: SELECT id, name, salary, initial, color, password, user_id FROM users
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (id, name, salary, initial, color, password, user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{salary}, #{initial}, #{color}, #{password}, #{user_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, salary = #{salary}, initial = #{initial}, color = #{color}, password = #{password}, user_id = #{user_id} WHERE id = #{id};
